name: MazeLabyrinth (VR + PC) - Prerelease
description:
Here in maze labyrinth you can expirienc 2, 3 and 4 dimensional mazes.

To move in 4th dimension you'll have 2 abilities:

- dimensional shift

- void walking

Their explanation is found in menu.

Controls for basic movement:

Win: wasd, space, shift

Quest: left controller joystick, right controller joystick up and down

In future I plan on adding more features and fixing some thing. This app is still in prerelease so please keep that in mind when you encounter some inconveniences.

If you like the game please leave a comment.

Other platforms:

sidequest: waiting for approval
